name: Visceral
description:
Visceral

Another University project. This time a 3D first person shooter. Where you play as a tobacco cell that is infecting a humans body. Your job is... Well to kill. Kill as much of their immune system as possible!

Year 2 - First Term

Team: 

  • Artist: Kayleigh Glassker (Concept Art & UI Design)
  • Artist: Liam van Asten ( 3D Art & Game Design)
  • Designer: Norina Vigh (Research & Level Design)
  • Designer: Tal Aviv (Scrum Master & Game Master)
  • Designer: Yoan Nikolov (Research & Cinematic)
  • Engineer: Jenoah Kers (Programming & Visual Effects)
